entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
